{"step_by_step_thinking": "Radiolucent stones are those that do not show up on an X-ray. According to Document [30], xanthine stones are usually seen in people who are on allopurinol and are hyperuricemic, which means both xanthine and allopurinol form radiolucent stones. Document [3] mentions that cystine calculi are only faintly radiodense, which means they are mostly radiolucent.
